title: The Christmas Collection
description: Christmas bells and Christmas lights. Snowy streets and bustling shops. Secret hopes and dark nights full of stars. Christmas, in all its merriment and all its mystery, is captured by master storyteller Susan Hill in four poignant stories and a rejoicing poem. Accompanied by John Lawrence's handsome wood engravings, they form a joyous volume of Christmas magic that will become a family reading tradition.
author: Susan         Hill
